articles.title: US records over a million cases in one day - eNCA
articles.description: Despite the record numbers, many Americans are still reluctant to get Covid-19 vaccine booster shots.
articles.content:
NEW YORK - The Omicron Covid-19 variant is wreaking havoc in the US.
Data from Johns Hopkins University reveals the country recorded over a million infections on Monday.
A new record for that count… [+207 chars]

articles.title: JK Rowling's battle to make the Harry Potter films '100 per cent British' - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: How the the boy wizard defeated all attempts at 'Hollywoodisation' – thanks to his creator's strict 'no Americans allowed' casting rule
articles.content: Twenty years on, the intense furor around the casting of Harry Potter himself is sometimes forgotten a kind of scrutiny usually reserved for a new James Bond. More American actors were linked to Harr… [+2022 chars]
